Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: POD
Print Details
Components.Query:
WITH CurrencySums AS (
    SELECT 
        SUM(det.Rate) AS TotalAmount,
        curr.Code AS CurrencyCode,
		curr.IsLocal AS localcurr
    FROM InquiryDetail det
    LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = det.CurrencyId
    WHERE det.InquiryId = '{Id}'
    GROUP BY curr.Code,curr.IsLocal
)
SELECT 
    cusType.Name AS CusType, 
    dept.Name AS Dept, 
    POL.Name AS POL, 
    POD.Name AS POD, 
	details.ScheduleIdsText AS Schedule,
	details.TransitTime AS transitime,
    cust.Address AS CustAddr, 
    sales.PhoneNumber AS SalesTel, 
    sales.Email AS SalesEmail, 
    sales.NickName AS SalesNick, 
    dept.Name AS SalesDept, 
    contact.JobTitles AS JobTitle, 
    contact.ContactName AS ContactName, 
    ISNULL(inco.Name, '') AS Inco, 
    ISNULL(Inquiry.DeliveryTerm, '') AS DeliveryT, 
    commo.Name AS Commo, 
    FORMAT(Inquiry.CargoReadyDate, 'dd MMM, yyyy') AS CargoReady, 
    Inquiry.GW AS QGW, 
    Inquiry.DeminsionText AS Dimension, 
    Inquiry.Quantity AS Qty, 
    unit.Name AS DUnit, 
    Inquiry.Pickup AS DPickup, 
    Inquiry.Delivery AS DDelivery, 
    Inquiry.Remark AS DRemark, 
    contact.ContactPhoneNumber AS CustTel,
    (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(cont.Name, ' x ', ROUND(inc.Quantity, 0)), ' & ') AS Containers
     FROM EntityContainer inc
     LEFT JOIN MasterData cont ON inc.ContainerTypeId = cont.Id
     WHERE inc.EntityId = '{Id}') AS Containers,

    (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 	THEN  FORMAT(TotalAmount, 'N{CLocalTotalPrice}')
	ELSE FORMAT(TotalAmount,'N{CTotalPrice}') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), '</br>') 
     FROM CurrencySums
     WHERE TotalAmount IS NOT NULL) AS AmountText

FROM Inquiry
LEFT JOIN Partner cust ON Inquiry.CustomerId = cust.Id
LEFT JOIN MasterData cusType ON cust.CustomerTypeId = cusType.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = Inquiry.PolId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = Inquiry.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData inco ON inco.Id = Inquiry.IncotermId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData commo ON commo.Id = Inquiry.CommodityId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id = Inquiry.UnitId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.InquiryDetail details ON details.InquiryId = dbo.Inquiry.Id

OUTER APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PartnerContact WHERE PartnerId = Inquiry.CustomerId) AS contact

LEFT JOIN [USER] sales ON cust.SaleId = sales.Id 
LEFT JOIN [User] [User] ON [User].Id = '{TokenUserId}'
LEFT JOIN MasterData dept ON dept.Id = [User].DepartmentId

WHERE Inquiry.Id = '{Id}'


SELECT 
ctnr.Code AS CTNR,
groupfee.Name AS GROUPFEE,
pol.Name AS POL, 
pod.Name AS POD, 
fee.Name AS DESCRIPTON, 
FORMAT( ISNULL(iq.Quantity,1),'N{CQuantity}') AS QTY,
 unit.Name AS UNIT,
 curr.Code AS CURR,
 CASE WHEN curr.IsLocal=1 THEN 
 FORMAT(iq.Rate,'N{CLocalUnitPrice}')
 ELSE FORMAT(iq.Rate,'N{CUnitPrice}')
   END AS RATE,

 CASE WHEN curr.IsLocal =1 
 THEN FORMAT((ISNULL(iq.Quantity,1)*iq.Rate),'N{CLocalTotalPrice}') 
 ELSE FORMAT((ISNULL(iq.Quantity,1)*iq.Rate),'N{CTotalPrice}') END   AS Amount 
 ,iq.Note AS notes,
  (select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = detail2.CurrencyId
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and curr.Code like N'%USD%'
) AS USDtoal,
 (select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = detail2.CurrencyId
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and curr.Code like N'%VND%'
) AS VNDTotal
 
  FROM 
dbo.InquiryDetail iq
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData ctnr ON ctnr.Id = iq.UnitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = iq.PolId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pod ON pod.Id = iq.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.FeeType fee ON fee.Id=iq.DescriptionId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData groupfee ON groupfee.Id = fee.GroupId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id = iq.OtherUnitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id=iq.CurrencyId
OUTER APPLY dbo.WebConfig decimalcf
WHERE 
iq.InquiryId='{Id}' AND iq.OtherFee=1
GROUP BY ctnr.Code,groupfee.Name,fee.Name,pol.Name,pod.Name,curr.IsLocal, iq.Quantity,unit.Name, curr.Code,iq.Rate,iq.Note,groupfee.Enum
ORDER BY  ctnr.code ,groupfee.Enum ASC
Components.Template:
${CLogo}  

${CCompanyName}

Address: ${CAddress}
 
 
        
   
 
        
   
Quotation
   Quote No : ${Quo No}
      Created At : ${Quo Date}
      Valid Until : ${Validity}
Company Name : ${Customer}   From : ${SalesNick}
Address : ${CustAddr}   Dept : ${SalesDept}
To : ${ContactName}   Tel : ${SalesTel}
Title : ${JobTitle}   Email : ${SalesEmail}
Tel : ${CustTel}            

 

Shipment Details

 

Route : ${POL} - ${POD} Quantity : ${Containers} Pickup : ${DPickup}
Incoterm : ${Inco} PCS : ${Qty} ${DUnit}    
Delivery term : ${DeliveryT} DIM (LxWxH) : ${DeminsionText} Delivery : ${DDelivery}
Commodity : ${Commo} G.W/CBM : ${QGW}/${CBM}    
Cargo Ready Date : ${CargoReady} TT/Freq : ${transitime} / ${Schedule} Remark : ${Note}

 

Price Details

 

Description Quantity Unit Curr Rate Amount Remark
 CALCULATED BY: #{CTNR}
 #{GROUPFEE}
 {DESCRIPTON} {QTY} {UNIT} {CURR} {RATE} {Amount}  {notes}
TOTAL  

${AmountText}

 

${Remark}
